author: Lara Seligman
title: Trump authorizes DoD, DHS to call up reservists to fight virus
description: The executive order provides DoD and DHS emergency authority to order to active duty as many as 1 million members of the ready reserves.
content:
President Donald Trump. | Erin Schaff-Pool/Getty Images
President Donald Trump signed an executive order Friday giving the Departments of Defense and Homeland Security the authority to activate the ready reserve components of the armed forces to support the … [+627 chars]
